chapters.name: Second fold 「Divine Sword」

parts.intro: Master is free. The world is so big that you can go wherever you want and do what you want.
parts.name: End

parts.intro: Li Sushang looked at her master and instinctively smiled, as if to chase away a shadow that could not be wiped away.
parts.name: Alive

parts.intro: Lingshuang calmly stared at Ma Feima's giant sword. There was a sparkle in her eyes, and it was as if she had many words hidden deep within her heart.
parts.name: 刃不破

parts.intro: For the past thirty-seven years of her life, Lingshuang has always held a sword and has never truly set foot in the world.
parts.name: Fifth Disciple of Taixuan

parts.intro: The flame went out.
parts.name: Fading Flame

parts.intro: Open sword vs. Open sword - Ki is released from the sword, and it heads towards the opponent without hesitation!
parts.name: Fire and Ice

parts.intro: A single word holds immense power- a single technique is all that is needed to topple Mount Sword
parts.name: One Sword, Part Two

parts.intro: The four shapes and twenty-one postures of Taixu seemed to sing from the heart's desire, singing in the hand and coming out immediately after calling it.
parts.name: One Sword, Part One

parts.intro: Because... Ma Feima was alone in this world that seemed to be shrouded in fog.
parts.name: Fog and Fire

parts.intro: What her eyes caught in this twisted world were only the Raksha's jade-like eyes.
parts.name: Heaven, Earth, Spiral

parts.intro: Like a flower blooming in the night air, the excitement of death spread through my heart, quickly drowning out the coldness in my whole body.
parts.name: Test of Ability

parts.intro: He raised his hands. Although his hands were empty, sword light was emitted in all directions――!
parts.name: Sword god?

parts.intro: Every move made was training in martial arts, and unwavering stillness was also training for his sword. This is what『harmonious natural formation』was all about。
parts.name: Unparalleled Freedom

parts.intro: 「It is said that the greatest taboo in a real person's life is to become too obsessed——」
parts.name: True Spirit

parts.intro: The tide rises and ebbs
parts.name: Ocean of Data

parts.intro: A man and a horse, similarly sleepless, were running across a vast desert sea.
parts.name: Piece-By-Piece sword

parts.intro: 「Schiksal is an organization created by three families together. It is said that the founder had unparalleled martial arts skills and was invincible in the world.」
parts.name: Schiksal

parts.intro: The night was long, and the two, unable to sleep, sat side by side, idly thinking until dawn.
parts.name: Western World

parts.intro: 「If Master comes to kill me, that's only natural. The murdered person has the right to take revenge.」
parts.name: Prologue

chapters.tips:
火が夜空を照らし、山荘を燃やし尽くした
秦素衣と精衛の再会、二人の間に一体何があったのか…
第三折：「憶剣」——お楽しみに！

chapters.name: First fold 「Trial Sword」

parts.intro: 「The master is back.」
parts.name: End

parts.intro: Li Sushang doesn't know about his past or his pain.
parts.name: 黒淵白花

parts.intro: Darkness rushed in from the broken side of his head and tried to swallow him, but he desperately resisted...
parts.name: 「You！」

parts.intro: The girl had never faced death before, but when she was about to die, she felt so empty.
parts.name: Duel

parts.intro: The balance of victory is not always tilted towards one side, and the weights that indicate superiority are constantly changing.
parts.name: Flaw

parts.intro: Both of them looked for an opening in the other. However, the third person was feeling a little numb.
parts.name: Tiger's Roar

parts.intro: Immediately,「Eagle」developed a killing intent, and along with it, a desire for revenge overflowed.
parts.name: Promise

parts.intro: Shadows illuminated by the flickering candle flame continue to dance on the stone pavement.
parts.name: Sword Dance Under The Moon

parts.intro: His expression could not be seen in the darkness. Nothing but indescribable sadness could be felt in his tone.
parts.name: Bad Raksha Man

parts.intro: 「Eagle」slaps the girl again.
parts.name: Slap

parts.intro: The sight of a sword dancing in the sky and falling was nothing more than a scene that lasted about a second or so.
parts.name: Legendary Sword

parts.intro: The『Dungeon』was originally a hole-in-the-wall storehouse at a post station.
parts.name: Dungeon

parts.intro: The next moment, I had the illusion that I would be crushed under foot by the Raksha.
parts.name: Life and death

parts.intro: Everything looked the same, everything had changed drastically.
parts.name: Overwhelming Victory

parts.intro: Those eyes are no longer eyes meant to watch, they start to move slowly--they are eyes meant to hunt.
parts.name: Ambush

parts.intro: However, the girl did not have that
, and neither did her master, who was born with little emotion.
parts.name: Girl

parts.intro: Civilizations rose and fell; humans came and went, but they all sunk into the endless sands of the long river of history.
parts.name: The Stop

parts.intro: In the endless darkness, the dead Celestial's consciousness awakened.
parts.name: Prologue

chapters.tips:
天穹峰にやってきた蘇湄。
馬非馬の行方。
そして、帰ってきた精衛……
神州折剣録第二折——お楽しみに！
